law.history: Repealed 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 17. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 87, sec. 2. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4421a-38.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Adoption of lists of books from which city independent districts are to select basal texts; period of use of adopted books; number that may be changed at any adoption period; when adoption periods begin.
